metadata.name: DANCE FAMILY
metadata.description:
In the hardest times of your life, dance as if no one could see you. No matter what's oppressing you, keep dancing. No matter what people laugh around you, keep dancing. No matter what anyone thinks of you, do what you have to do, make art and create. Don't expect anything in return, don't expect applause. Just keep moving, find your way.

Specifications: 96 frames, 10 frames per second, 256 colors. Consists of 6 gif files and two png files, animated in Photoshop and After Effects. Dimensions 1400x900 pixels. File Size 49.9 MB

Inspired by PEGZ, HEDZ, and ZOGZ collections by Matt Furie
